SELECT A.POLL_ID, A.POLL_NM, A.POLL_BGNDE, A.POLL_ENDDE, A.POLL_KND, A.POLL_DSUSE_ENNC, A.POLL_ATMC_DSUSE_ENNC, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, DATE_FORMAT(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM, (SELECT USER_NM FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE ESNTL_ID = A.FRST_REGISTER_ID) FRST_REGISTER_NM FROM COMTNONLINEPOLLMANAGE A WHERE 1=1 AND POLL_ID = #{pollId}
ORDER BY A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC

SELECT A.POLL_ID, A.POLL_IEM_ID, (SELECT POLL_IEM_NM FROM COMTNONLINEPOLLIEM WHERE POLL_ID=A.POLL_ID AND POLL_IEM_ID=A.POLL_IEM_ID) POLL_IEM_NM, A.POLL_RESULT_ID, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE ESNTL_ID = A.FRST_REGISTER_ID) FRST_REGISTER_NM, DATE_FORMAT(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') AS FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, DATE_FORMAT(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM COMTNONLINEPOLLRESULT A WHERE 1=1 AND A.POLL_ID = #{pollId} ORDER BY POLL_IEM_NM
